mainText:
Hello,

                      Today morning, i woke up and was going through the
iPhone news channels. Boom came across this news. Really saddened by it and
its really hard to believe. May Steve rest in peace. Looks like he was
suffering from the said disease badly. Gods will is Gods will. He made a
empire in a matter of few years and made people to believe in what he made,
full of fun, creativity. Hats off to him. I am and was a great fan of him
and his products since childhood and always follow what he has done and what
he wants to do next.

Once again thanks a ton Steve and god bless you.
author: Sumeet
